title: Introduction to CKB Script Programming 8: Performant WASM
description: In an earlier post, I've shown you that you can have WASM programming running on CKB, with a little caveat that the WASM programs might not be so performant. I also mentioned that there is a potential solution that could solve the problem. And now it's the day! We now have a new project that could be used to generate performant WASM programs. Let's see how it works in this post.
